snippet: The changes enacted by the Republican-controlled legislature cut the maximum benefit by more than one-third, and opponents said the measure was “literally hurting people.”
abstract: North Carolina's sharp cuts in unemployment benefits take effect amid swelling public outcry; far-reaching changes enacted by Republican-controlled legislature decreases maximum benefit payout by more than one-third and reduces number of weeks residents can receive unemployment aid.
lead_paragraph: The changes enacted by the Republican-controlled legislature cut the maximum benefit by more than one-third, and opponents said the measure was “literally hurting people.”

headline.main: North Carolina’s Deep Cut to Jobless Benefits Takes Effect Amid Protests
headline.print_headline: North Carolina’s Deep Cut to Jobless Benefits Takes Effect Amid a Storm of Protest
